original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at Rs327.60/328.10, bond yields slightly up
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 327.90/328.10 to the US dollar Friday, almost unchanged from 327.60/328.00 a day earlier, dealers said while bonds yields were slightly up.
A bond maturing on 01.06.2025 closed at 14.55/75 percent slightly up from 14.50/85 percent Thursday.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 closed at 14.70/75 flat from 14.70/80 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 closed at 14.70/75 percent up from 14.65/80 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 closed at 14.75/80 up from 14.70/85 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 14.30/60 percent, up from 14.35/55 percent. (Colombo/Nov17/2023)
